DESCRIPTION: Creatures in #yAgony deal #b80% less damage with Attacks.
#yCrippled enemies can no longer lose #yWeak. At the end of their turn, they lose HP equal to their #yWeak.
Echoes are copies of cards with Ethereal and Exhaust.
Whenever you play an attack, apply #b1 #yWeak to all targets.
Whenever you play a skill, gain #b1 #yWiz.
Whenever you play a skill, gain #b2 #yBlock.
Whenever you play an attack, deal #b3 damage to a random enemy.
Switch places with another character. Does nothing if there is no valid target.
When you have at least three stacks of Wiz, attacks will consume all stacks to deal 10 additional damage.
